title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Platform e-commerce lengkap dengan sistem pembayaran, manajemen inventaris, dan dashboard admin.
descriptionEn: Complete e-commerce platform with payment system, inventory management, and admin dashboard.

title: Health Tracking App
description: Aplikasi mobile untuk melacak kesehatan daily dengan fitur workout, diet, dan konsultasi dokter.
descriptionEn: Mobile app for tracking daily health with workout, diet, and doctor consultation features.

title: Banking Dashboard
description: Redesign dashboard internet banking dengan focus pada user experience dan accessibility.
descriptionEn: Internet banking dashboard redesign focusing on user experience and accessibility.

title: Restaurant POS System
description: Sistem Point of Sale untuk restoran dengan fitur pemesanan, pembayaran, dan laporan penjualan.
descriptionEn: Point of Sale system for restaurants with ordering, payment, and sales reporting features.

title: Fitness App
description: Aplikasi fitness dengan program workout personal, tracking progress, dan integrasi wearable devices.
descriptionEn: Fitness app with personal workout programs, progress tracking, and wearable device integration.

title: E-Learning Platform
description: Platform pembelajaran online dengan fitur video streaming, quiz, dan progress tracking.
descriptionEn: Online learning platform with video streaming, quiz, and progress tracking features.

title: Travel Booking App
description: Aplikasi pemesanan perjalanan dengan fitur hotel, pesawat, dan paket wisata.
descriptionEn: Travel booking app with hotel, flight, and tour package features.

title: Real Estate Dashboard
description: Dashboard untuk agen properti dengan fitur listing, client management, dan analytics.
descriptionEn: Dashboard for real estate agents with listing, client management, and analytics features.
